title: Malphite ult Change (Buff and Nerf)
body:
Range increased to 1500.

Now malphite stops on first champion hit and knocks all enemies around target into the air (similar to his old ult but now a cone instead of a circle.


How this changes malphite? 

He no longer can just steam through the enemy team and get to the back line unless he takes the proper angle.

Additionally, its harder to tell when he is coming because the range is so large now.

Similar to fiddle sticks engage.

replies.body: But then how would I pull off my patented "ult into the middle of their team but somehow hit nobody" technique?
as long as it's still a dash I'm fine though... now for AoE knockup range...
that sounds to me like a shorter range sion ult that can only travel in a straight line.
